name: NoDM
description: This bot enable PM permit in your Telegram account.

API_ID.description: Your api id, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: Your api hash, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

SESSION.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)
